title: Panel Discussion on �Shaping the Future of the Macroeconomic Policy Mix�
content: - 6 -     Reserve will strive to clearly and transparently communicate its monetary policy strategy   in order to minimize the likelihood of surprises that could disrupt financial markets, both   at home and around the world.  More importantly, the normalization of monetary policy   will be an important sign that economic conditions more generally are finally emerging   from the shadow of the Great Recession.
